canvas

Class DrawingBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • canvas.DrawingBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class DrawingBoard
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    A JPanel that can be drawn on. Includes drawing tools.
    Author:
    Dániel Gál
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • DrawingBoard

        public DrawingBoard()
        Class constructor

        Creates a new white drawing board with the default image size values. Calls initTools() and selects the Brush tool.

    • Method Detail

      • initTools

        private void initTools()
        Initializes tools Adds the BufferedImage's Graphics to the tools, so they can manipulate the image.

        Add tools to the drawing board in this function.

      • setToolGraphics

        private void setToolGraphics()
        Loops through the tools and sets the tools' Graphics to that of the image's.

      • getPreferredSize

        public java.awt.Dimension getPreferredSize()
        Override of the JPanel's getPreferredSize() method.

        With this override, the JScrollPane will get the size of the BufferedImage and apply the scrollbars accordingly.

        getPreferredSize in class javax.swing.JComponent
